newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Comercial Mexicana starts.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Comercial Mexicana starts.

text.p: -- J.P. Morgan Securities said on Friday it had started coverage of Controladora Comercial Mexicana S.A., or CCM, with a buy rating.

-- "In our opinion CCM's growth outlook for 1997 and into 1998 is better than its peer group given the prospect for operating earnings of more than 20 percent in real terms in both forecast years," analysts Debra Wang and Richard Long wrote in a report.
-- Other reasons for the listing included the chance for higher sales and earnings and the improving outlook for the Mexican consumer into 1997 and 1998.
-- Their 12- to 15-month target price is $22 per American Depositary Receipt, for price appreciation of 23 percent.
